name: US Army Multistorey Truck Transport:Zombie Edition
name_original: US Army Multistorey Truck Transport:Zombie Edition
description:
Humans have fallen to the wrath of zombie apocalypse & you are the last hope for the survivors.

Transport army vehicles from army bases to the survivors, also called THE RESISTANCE. You are now a part of the resistance & they depend on you. Take vehicles like SUV's, jeeps & cars to the resistance to help them repel the zombie attack. Crush zombies on your way to clear your path & complete mission objective. Also drive the cruiser jeeps to clear the path for the truck. Load & unload the jeeps & cars by driving yourself in the multistory truck.
Remember time is an essence. If you fail to complete your mission & complete the delivery on time the resistance will fall.
It's time to show your leadership. So are you ready?Lets go.

Features:
• Thrilling Urban City Transport and Driving Sim of 2017
• Variety of Transport Missions in this Offroad Adventure
• Dangerous Urban City Turns, Jeeps, Truck, Helicopter and Much More
• Beautiful 3D Graphics and Engaging Sound Effects
• Enthralling Urban City Adventures With Best Transport Simulator
• Dangerous Transport Missions And External Force Attacks
• Multi Story Transporter Truck for More Vehicle Delivery per Trip
• Advance Controls Of Cruisers, Trucks, SUV’s, Jeeps With Real Time Physics
• 3D Graphics And Engaging Sound Effects
• Transport Different Military truck vehicles like Cruisers, Trucks, SUV’s, Jeeps etc.
